instruction: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions until golden.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add spices and cook the mixture.

Boil pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain and keep aside.
In a pan, melt butter on low flame and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add flour and cook, stirring continuously, until the raw smell goes away.
Slowly add milk while whisking to avoid lumps. Cook until the sauce thickens.
Season with salt, black pepper, and mixed herbs. Add cheese if using.
Add boiled pasta to the sauce, toss well, and cook for a couple of minutes.
